Description:
Storing files in Alternate Data Stream (ADS) similar to Astaroth malware.

Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Powershell Store File In Alternate Data Stream
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where (scriptblocktext like '%start-process%' and scriptblocktext like '%-filepath "$env:comspec" %' and scriptblocktext like '%-argumentlist %' and scriptblocktext like '%>%')
